languages.text: {n}Ульфар недобро осклабивается.{/n} "Молись, чтобы следующая моя виса не была о том, как надменн{mf|ый|ая} Вольный Торговец поплатил{mf|ся|ась} за дерзость. Тебе она не понравится".
{n}Ulfar scowls ominously.{/n} "Pray that my next verse is not about an arrogant Rogue Trader who got {mf|his|her} comeuppance. You wouldn't like it."
languages.original_text: {n}Ульфар недобро осклабивается.{/n} "Молись, чтобы следующая моя виса не была о том, как надменн{mf|ый|ая} Вольный Торговец поплатил{mf|ся|ась} за дерзость. Тебе она не понравится".

languages.text: {n}乌尔法发出了不祥的咆哮声。{/n}“你最好祈祷一下，希望我接下来的传说讲的不是某个傲慢的行商浪人遭到报应的故事。你不会喜欢这样的史诗。”
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar scowls ominously.{/n} "Pray that my next verse is not about an arrogant Rogue Trader who got {mf|his|her} comeuppance. You wouldn't like it."

traits.locale_text: {n}乌尔法发出了不祥的咆哮声。{/n}“你最好祈祷我的下一篇传说，讲的不是某个傲慢的行商浪人遭到报应的故事。你不会喜欢这样的史诗。”

languages.text: {n}ウルファーは不吉に顔をしかめた。{/n}「俺の次の詩が、報いを受けた傲慢な自由開拓者でない事を祈るがいい。きっとお前は、喜びはしないだろう」
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar scowls ominously.{/n} "Pray that my next verse is not about an arrogant Rogue Trader who got {mf|his|her} comeuppance. You wouldn't like it."

traits.locale_text: {n}ウルファーは不吉に顔をしかめた。{/n}「俺の次の詩が、報いを受けた傲慢な自由開拓者でない事を祈るがいい。きっとお前は、喜びはしないだろう」

languages.text: {n}Ulfar frunce el ceño ominosamente.{/n} «Rece para que mi próxima estrofa no sea sobre {mf|un|una} Comerciante Independiente arrogante que se llevó su merecido. No le gustaría».
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar scowls ominously.{/n} "Pray that my next verse is not about an arrogant Rogue Trader who got {mf|his|her} comeuppance. You wouldn't like it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar frunce el ceño ominosamente.{/n} «Rece para que mi próximo visur no sea sobre {mf|un|una} Comerciante Independiente arrogante que se llevó su merecido. No le gustaría».

languages.text: {n}Ulfar knurrt bedrohlich.{/n} "Betet, dass mein nächster Verse nicht von {mf|einem arroganten Freihändler handelt, der bekommen hat, was er|einer arroganten Freihändlerin handelt, die bekommen hat, was sie} verdient. Es würde Euch nicht gefallen."
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar scowls ominously.{/n} "Pray that my next verse is not about an arrogant Rogue Trader who got {mf|his|her} comeuppance. You wouldn't like it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar knurrt bedrohlich.{/n} "Bettet, dass mein nächster Visur nicht von {mf|einem arroganten Freihändler handelt, der bekommen hat, was er|einer arroganten Freihändlerin handelt, die bekommen hat, was sie} verdient. Es würde Euch nicht gefallen."

languages.text: {n}Ulfar se renfrogne, l'air menaçant.{/n} « Priez pour que ma prochaine ballade ne raconte pas l'histoire d'{mf|un libre-marchand arrogant|une libre-marchande arrogante} qui a eu ce qu'{mf|il|elle} méritait. Je doute que cette histoire vous plaise. »
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar scowls ominously.{/n} "Pray that my next verse is not about an arrogant Rogue Trader who got {mf|his|her} comeuppance. You wouldn't like it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar se renfrogne, l'air menaçant.{/n} « Priez pour que mon prochain vísur ne raconte pas l'histoire d'{mf|un libre-marchand arrogant|une libre-marchande arrogante} qui a eu ce qu'{mf|il|elle} méritait. Je doute que cette histoire vous plaise. »

languages.text: {n}Ulfar, tehdit edercesine kaşlarını çatıyor.{/n} "Dua et ki sonraki mısram, belasını bulan küstah bir Hür Tacir'i anlatmasın. O kısmı hiç hoşuna gitmez."
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar scowls ominously.{/n} "Pray that my next verse is not about an arrogant Rogue Trader who got {mf|his|her} comeuppance. You wouldn't like it."
